'''Melt You Down Like Ice Cream''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[Elemental Specialist]]''. The achievements are earned by defeating 4 opponents with [[Melt]] within two seconds.

* This achievement's name may come from the opening lyrics of the song {{w|Ice Cream (Hyuna song)|Ice Cream}} by South Korean singer {{w|Hyuna}}.
